title: MAG 079 - Hide and Seek Transcript
text:
uld be best. 
ARCHIVIST 
(Whispered) Please forgive me. If you’re still alive… if… if you hear this. Get as 
far away from the Magnus Institute – 
NOT!SASHA 
 

The Magnus Archives – MAG079 – Hide and Seek 
18 
 
Found you. 
ARCHIVIST 
No. Please… 
NOT!SASHA 
Sorry, John, but this is – 
[The walls of the tunnel shifts with scraping stone. Not!Sasha screams. 
There’s silence.] 
ARCHIVIST 
What? 
UNKNOWN 
Mr. Sims? 
ARCHIVIST 
Yes. 
UNKNOWN 
I think it’s time we had a talk. 
[Tape clicks off.] 
[The Magnus Archives Theme – Outro]
